name: Regolith Odyssey
description:
Regolith Odyssey is a brand new game for the Game Boy Advance. 
It's designed, built and optimized specifically for the handheld. 
It's a story driven, adventure platformer with all the classic mechanics of the genre. You will find a lot of inspirations from games of the 16-bit era.
You will be walking, jumping, crouching and of course shooting and collecting items!
The game contains original handcrafted pixel art and animations, sounds and music. It's implemented in C and ARM assembly as we want to squeeze all what's possible from the hardware.

The game is still in early phase development, we are releasing a first demo level for now, we will keep releasing updates frequently, so stay tuned!



The protagonist is an astronaut that is exploring newly discovered planets. He is looking for precious minerals and takes notes on the planets environment and lifeforms.
He has a rocket backpack in his disposal that helps him to reach out to places too far for a regular jump, especially on planets with higher gravity.
As the planets hide many secrets, some deadly, he can defend himself with a range of short and long-range weapons. 
He needs to collect minerals to fuel the backpack and some of the weapons.

In his journey the astronaut explores many different worlds. 
The worlds differ in gravity, type of terrain to move on, so the astronaut have to adapt his behavior to the environment.
Some of the worlds seem dead - built of plain rock, mud and sand or completely frozen. Others will be alive and vivid, similar to rainforests on the home planet Earth.
But be sure that all of them are inhabited - by various creatures, usually aggressive and dangerous.

In the vastness of the worlds of Regolith Odyssey, the astronaut will have to face various forms of life. He will encounter hostile creatures, as well as those that will be friendly, and it will only depend on you how you use the potential.

In the infinite universe, there are many amazing entities, such as flying creatures, 

walking creatures, 

cruel bosses 

And many others
